nodes.text: An arms dealer, arms merchant, or weapons dealer, was one who dealt in the trade of weapons. Weazel and a Trandoshan associate of his worked as arms dealers on Tatooine in 32 BBY, during which time the Hutt crime lord Dreddon was also active. During the Clone Wars, a Rodian named Pablo sold arms and armor in his pawnshop on Nal Hutta. The individual known as Gundark was a well-known arms dealer during the Galactic Civil War.
